title: ​Joy​ of our Hearts​​
body_text:
Whatever meagre resources I had, I took him to many doctors who conducted all kinds of tests. It was eventually diagnosed that my child had a hole in his heart which required expensive surgery. I prostrated to Allah (swt) and implored him. Friends guided us to the Aga Khan University Hospital (AKUH) where we were assured medical assistance and help through PBS and Patient Welfare.

The successful surgery was conducted by an expert team of health professionals with love and respect and the generosity of the donors who opened their hearts for people like us, brought tears of gratitude in our eyes and duas for them as long as we live.

Today, Muhammad Moiz is a healthy, playful three-year-old with a big smile on his face."

Muhammad Ijaz Khan and his wife are not the first parents to experience the pain, suffering and worry caused by their financial circumstances. There are many families in dire need of compassionate care and high-quality treatment for rare and critical health conditions. AKUH provides world-class healthcare to everyone who seeks treatment, regardless of their financial background, and it never turns anyone away because of their inability to pay.

Your Zakat and Sadaqat to the Patients' Behbud Society for AKUH provides such needy patients with new hope and a chance with life. Donate generously to save precious lives.​
